original_text: Yes, you have seen what the Lord your God has done. He made the Jordan River become dry, so that you could cross over it. That was like he did to the Red Sea, so that we could cross it when we left Egypt.
korean_text: 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 요단 물을 너희 앞에서 마르게 하사 너희를 건너게 하신 것이 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 우리 앞에 홍해를 말리시고 우리를 건너게 하심과 같았나니

sentences.original_text: what the Lord your God has done
He made the Jordan River become dry
so that you could cross over it
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신이 그것을 건널 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: That was like he did to the Red Sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 홍해에서 하신 것과 같았습니다

sentences.original_text: so that we could cross it
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리가 그것을 건널 수 있었습니다
